title: 插件报错
author: 龙息法师
txt_content:
如题，是PermissionsEX插件的问题
报错如下
[10:09:39 ERROR]: [PermissionsEx] The updater could not contact dev.bukkit.org for updating.
[10:09:39 ERROR]: [PermissionsEx] If you have not recently modified your configuration and this is the first time you are seeing this message, the site may be experiencing temporary downtime.
[10:09:39 ERROR]: [PermissionsEx] null
java.net.SocketException: Permission denied: connect
at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.waitForConnect(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.<init>(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsClient.New(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDeleg ... on.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect0(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.AbstractDelegateHttpsURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream0(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_101]
at ru.tehkode.libs.net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.read(Updater.java:643) [%5B1.9.X-1.11.X%5D-权限管理-PermissionsEx-1.23.4.jar:?]
at ru.tehkode.libs.net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.runUpdater(Updater.java:718) [%5B1.9.X-1.11.X%5D-权限管理-PermissionsEx-1.23.4.jar:?]
at ru.tehkode.libs.net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.access$100(Updater.java:36) [%5B1.9.X-1.11.X%5D-权限管理-PermissionsEx-1.23.4.jar:?]
at ru.tehkode.libs.net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater$UpdateRunnable.run(Updater.java:713) [%5B1.9.X-1.11.X%5D-权限管理-PermissionsEx-1.23.4.jar:?]
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_101]

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: PermissionsEX 的配置文件中，设置 updater: false

replies.author: 龙息法师
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-19 10:21
PermissionsEX 的配置文件中，设置 updater: false
感谢，解决了。
